name: information-management-awareness-raising-log
title: Information Management Awareness Raising Log
description: This log records the internal awareness raising activities carried out by the Information Management and Security team at the FSA. The data includes a brief description of the awareness raising subject, the month it occurred and the channel used. FoodWEB is the FSA intranet. Wisdom is the name of the FSA Records Management System. Yammer is used for social networking within the FSA.

resources.name: Information Management Awareness Raising Log 2015
resources.description: This log records the internal awareness raising activities carried out by the Information Management and Security team at the FSA in 2015. The data includes a brief description of the awareness raising subject, the month it occurred and the channel used. FoodWEB is the FSA intranet. Wisdom is the name of the FSA Records Management System. Yammer is used for social networking within the FSA.
